name: IO_FLO_ROWS_UNL
description: This table holds a portion of the Flowsheet rows that contributed to non-occurrence based intake and output (IO). Do not use this table directly--instead use view IO_FLO_ROWS.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the inpatient record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IO_FLOWSHEETROW_IDS
columns.description: Flowsheet rows that can be used for non-occurrence intake/output (IO) documentation. For duplicable rows, the identifier used to distinguish among multiple rows is stored in OCCURRENCE.

columns.name: IO_FLOWSHEETROW_IDS_DISP_NAME
columns.description: The display name given to the flowsheet group/row.

columns.name: OCCURRENCE
columns.description: If the flowsheet group/row is duplicable, this will distinguish the occurrence.
